get.summary: View a list of room participants.

parameters.name: filter[date_joined_at][eq]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room participants that joined on that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_joined_at][gte]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room participants that joined after that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_joined_at][lte]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room participants that joined before that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_updated_at][eq]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room participants updated on that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_updated_at][gte]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room participants updated after that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_updated_at][lte]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room participants updated before that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_left_at][eq]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room participants that left on that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_left_at][gte]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room participants that left after that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_left_at][lte]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room participants that left before that date.

parameters.name: filter[context]
parameters.description: Filter room participants based on the context.
